channel.title: Marsja Mudde Muziek
channel.description: Recent content on Marsja Mudde Muziek

item.description: Mijn naam is Marsja Mudde, zangeres en zangpedagoge. Het zingen van ensemblemuziek en solorepertoire uit de Middeleeuwen, Renaissance en de vroege Barok zie ik als mijn roeping.

item.title: Soho Theme
item.description: Soho is a minimalist two-column hugo theme based on Hyde and inspired by the success of Flex.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
